results.text: በዚያች ብጤዋ በአገሮች ውስጥ ያልተፈጠረ በኾነችው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በሰሙድም በእነዚያ በሸለቆው ቋጥኝን የቆረጡ በኾኑት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሷም ውስጥ ጥፋትን ያበዙ በኾኑት (እንዴት እንደሠራ አታውቅምን?)
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእነርሱ ላይም ጌታህ የቅጣትን አለንጋ አወረደባቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
